name: Ninjafish
tagline: Control Ninja Block Devices from SailfishOS
body:
![Ninjafish](https://github.com/jgibbon/ninjafish/raw/master/qml/cover/coverimage.png)

This is an early Alpha Version which may and will stop functioning when you least expect it. In fact, I'm using this Project to get my Feet wet both with QML and with what I really want to do with my Ninja Block.
Not surprisingly, the current state of this is an interesting dish of "Tutorial Copypasta" with sprinkles of hastily thrown together glue code for good measure and some quick hacks.
I released it anyway, because against all odds it seems to become useful to people even like this.

Some early Screenshots, because everyone loves those:
http://imgur.com/a/0qUFN
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
